name: DCH AABR Hearing Test Outcome
description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the outcome of an automated auditory brainstem response hearing test.
copyright: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

concept.display: Automated auditory brainstem response test left ear clear response
Automated auditory brainstem response test right ear clear response
Automated auditory brainstem response test left ear no clear response
Automated auditory brainstem response test right ear no clear response
